item.title: ‘Ida’ Star Agata Trzebuchowska Talks Directing Incest Horror ‘Ties’ and ‘This Is No Place for You,’ Debuts First-Look Clip (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: “Ida” star Agata Trzebuchowska makes her directorial debut with “Ties.” “I’ve never felt like an actress and never planned to tie my future to it. ‘Ida’ was a complete accident, but a wonderful one, b
